const declarativeCode = ` console.log('Home')}> Home console.log('About')}> About console.log('Company Culture')}> Company Culture `; const disabledCode = `
Declarative Style
console.log('Home')}> Home console.log('About')}> About console.log('Company Culture')}> Company Culture `; const seperatorCode = '} />'; const simpleCode = ` const items = [ { content: 'Home', key: 0, onClick: () => console.log('Home'), }, { content: 'About', key: 1, onClick: () => console.log('About'), }, { content: 'Company Culture', key: 2, onClick: () => console.log('Company Culture'), }, ]; `; export { declarativeCode, seperatorCode, simpleCode, };
